name: Snake Swiper 3D AR
description:
Best traveling augmented reality game in the world. Scan the area, Start the game and find the food for Snake.

Speed level:
- Normal
- Quick
- Quickest

Casual Actions**
- Play game on Living room, Bedroom, Garden or Road.
- Choose the best surface in the real world to play the game.
- Start game and swipe finger to direct snake.
- Use the power of augmented reality find food for the snake.
- Keep active yourself and move the iPhone accordingly.
- Make a high score of snake food.
- See scoreboard position

It's the slithering snake! Lets refer to your friend today!

Let us know what you think! Any Suggestion? Any technical support? Contact us on mayihelpu4app@gmail.com
